thread.title: Sonam Kapoor is ready to go public with boyfriend Anand Ahuja – watch video
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor is ready to go public with boyfriend Anand Ahuja – watch video

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Sonam Kapoor is ready to go public with boyfriend Anand Ahuja – watch video
text:
Sonam Kapoor, Sridevi, Shilpa Shetty: Celebs spotted at airport 
While 2016 was the year of break-ups, this year seems to belong to couples who have been going steady since a while now and are now ready to go public. Sidharth Malhotra and Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal have already gone public with their relationship at the recently held pre-birthday bash of actor Shahid Kapoor and it seems like Sonam Kapoor has jumped on the bandwagon too. The actress shared a super cute video with her rumoured boyfriend, Anand Ahuja, on Instagram. The actress is seen getting goofy in the video and Anand seems to be enjoying her antics. She captioned the video as, “Everything will be great. Better than great. Just sometimes a step back gives perspective and allows for more steps forward” – Anand Ahuja @anandahuja #everydayphenomenal A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:29am PST 
Wow..that’s truly an insightful thought, isn’t it? And she just confessed that every day is phenomenal with Anand! Clearly, love is in the air. 
Sonam and Anand Ahuja’s rumoured love affair started making headlines when he was spotted with Sonam Kapoor’s family during Diwali celebrations. The family pic with Anand in it went viral on social media. Since then the actress has been very upfront about her relationship with him. They even spent New Year’s together and she keeps sharing funny moments from their trips together on her Instagram account. While she hasn’t really confessed to seeing him, she has been dropping major hints about the same on social media. That itself speaks volumes about her relationship status. (ALSO READ: Sonam Kapoor and beau Anand Ahuja look the cutest in this Instagram post ) 
On the work front, Sonam is about to start working on Veere Di Wedding. The film, which also stars Kareena Kapoor Khan, Swara Bhaskar and Shikha Talsania in lead roles, was supposed to go on floors in January this year. However, the shoot of the film got delayed and it will now start rolling in May. 
Coming back to the video…aren’t the lovebirds adorable?
